A's! I love you.

[ Mockingly ] Oh, Steve, we're gonna get busted.
Hey! Rock. Come on.

What the heck is that?

-Hey. Hey, come on! - [ Footsteps Scampering ]

Hello?

Are you 21?

the exotic,

You.

"Octa."

-Mr. Tiny? Back from the other side? -Yes!

translation.ko: 관련된 게 느껴진다니까! 같이 가세 빈센트의 원수를 갚아야지

translation.en: Kill us some Vampaneze! No.
I'm sorry. No? Why?
translation.ko: - 뱀파니즈들을 죽이자고! - 미안하지만 안 돼 안 된다고? 왜?

translation.en: I'm done fighting.
I left that life for a reason.
translation.ko: 그런 생활은 청산했어 난 그냥 삼류 배우야

translation.en: I'm just a vaudevillian. It's a simple life, and I like it.
translation.ko: 그런 생활은 청산했어 난 그냥 삼류 배우야 조촐한 삶이지 맘에 들어

translation.en: Steve. [ Steve ] I know who you are.
translation.ko: 스티브 난 당신의 정체를 알아요 버 호스텐

translation.en: I know what you are, Vur Horsten.
translation.ko: 난 당신의 정체를 알아요 버 호스텐

translation.en: [ Gasps ] Who sent you? The Apocalypse Monger?
translation.ko: 누가 보냈지? 종말론 바람잡이? 피의 남작?

translation.en: The Blood Barons? [ Steve ] No... No one. I... No one sent me.
translation.ko: 누가 보냈지? 종말론 바람잡이? 피의 남작? 아니에요 그런 사람 몰라요, 그냥...

translation.en: I have these vampire books, and I saw a painting of him with some girl in, like, 1819.
translation.ko: 뱀파이어 책에서 그의 그림을 봤어요 소녀를 그린 1819년 작품이오

translation.en: It said that she broke up with him when she found he was a vampire.
translation.ko: 그가 뱀파이어란 걸 알고 헤어졌다고 적혀 있었어요

translation.en: [ Chuckling ] Did you hear that, Gavner?
Missy broke up with me because I was a vampire.
Funny. I always thought it was the only thing she liked about me.
translation.ko: 정말 웃겨, 그것 때문에 그녀가 날 좋아했는데 말이야

translation.en: Let the kid go. Let him go.
Now, are you mentally unfit?
Didn't you hear me threaten you at the show?
translation.ko: 공연 중에 내가 널 위협하는 것 못 들었어?

translation.en: I did. It was awesome.
You see, I want this. I want you to make me into a vampire.
translation.ko: 제가 원하는 건 이거예요 저를 뱀파이어로 만들어주세요

translation.en: I mean, vampires, they... they don't take crap from anybody.
They live by their own set of rules.
It's true. They do have their own rules.
translation.ko: 규칙이 있는 건 맞아 일부는 우리가 만들었지

translation.en: We wrote some of them. Yes, and one of them is children can't become vampires.
translation.ko: 규칙이 있는 건 맞아 일부는 우리가 만들었지 그중 하나가 어린애는 뱀파이어가 될 수 없다는 거야

translation.en: Look, look. Blood. [ Gasps ] Blood!
You see, Gavner? Blood.
Look. If you become a vampire,
you have to leave your friends and your family.
It's deeply depressing. Trust me.
Now get out of here.
I haven't seen my dad in years.
My mom is drunk all the time.
I absolutely hate my life.
I never actually said it before, but it's the truth.
translation.ko: 이런 말을 꺼낸 적은 없지만 사실이에요

translation.en: This... is what I was meant for.
What you're meant for?
Well, if that's the case, let's test your blood.
N-No. No!
Who sent you here? Your blood tastes of evil.
translation.ko: 누가 널 보냈지? 네 피는 악의 맛이 나

translation.en: You can never be a vampire.
translation.ko: 넌 결코 뱀파이어가 될 수 없어

translation.en: [ Steve ] What?
I-I have what, bad blood?
I'm never gonna forget this.
translation.ko: 이 일은 절대 안 잊을 거예요

translation.en: One day, I promise you. I will hunt you down--
And what?
Kill me?
Do you know how easily I could kill you?
translation.ko: 너 하나 죽이는 건 일도 아냐 오늘 밤 당장 죽일 수도 있어

translation.en: I could do it tonight. I could knock you out...
translation.ko: 너 하나 죽이는 건 일도 아냐 오늘 밤 당장 죽일 수도 있어 널 쳐서 기절시킨 다음 버스 앞에 내려놓으면

translation.en: and lay you in front of a bus, and no one would ever know!
translation.ko: 널 쳐서 기절시킨 다음 버스 앞에 내려놓으면 아무도 모를걸!

translation.en: Calm down. Save that stuff for the enemy.
translation.ko: 진정해, 그건 적한테 써야지 얜 그냥 멍청한 어린애잖아

translation.en: He's just an idiot kid, who should be leaving...
translation.ko: 진정해, 그건 적한테 써야지 얜 그냥 멍청한 어린애잖아 당장 여기서 나가

translation.en: right now...
while he still can. [ Door Slams Shut ]
You're out there, man.
All right. One for the road.
I'm headed back to the mountain...
to try to convince those old cowards to stand up against the Vampaneze.
Gavner, if we kill one of them, it means war.
translation.ko: 개브너, 우리가 그들 중 하나를 죽이면 바로 전쟁이야

translation.en: Wouldn't that be a shame?
Poor old Vincent.
You've been awfully quiet under there.
translation.ko: 옥타, 아까부터 쥐 죽은 듯 조용하구나

translation.en: Get in.
Thanks. Thanks. I, uh... I really needed a ride. [ Chuckles ]
Oh, absolutely. Absolutely. Delighted. [ Man Groans ]
Are you the one known as Steve?
No. I, uh... I'm the one known as Darren.
I, uh... I-I actually had a bike.
But I'll-I'll just get it tomorrow...
translation.ko: 자전거를 두고 왔어요 내일 날이 밝으면 찾죠, 뭐

translation.en: in the daylight. No need.
translation.ko: 내일 날이 밝으면 찾죠, 뭐 그럴 필요 없어 트렁크에 들었어

translation.en: It's in the trunk.
Now, if I may ask, Darren,
do you believe in the immutability of the human soul?
translation.ko: 넌 인간의 영혼이 절대 변하지 않는다고 믿니?

translation.en: The what? [ Man Groans ]
translation.ko: 뭐라고요? 얘는 영혼에 관한 건 전혀 모르는 거지?

translation.en: He knows nothing of souls, does he?
translation.ko: 얘는 영혼에 관한 건 전혀 모르는 거지?

translation.en: Knows only of blood, huh?
The pulsing, delicious, the ruby red. [ Device Whirring ]
Uh... Wow. Wow. You know what? You can just let me off right here.
What's the rush? After all,
translation.ko: 왜 서둘러? 어쨌든 우리가 무시무시한 뱀파이어로부터 구해줬잖아?

translation.en: didn't we save you from the scary, scary vampire?
Doesn't act like leadership material.
Acts more like a bag of blood. Are you? Huh?
translation.ko: 피 주머니답게 행동해 알았어? 피 주머니 말이야

translation.en: Bag of blood? Shows how much you know, Murlaugh.
translation.ko: 피 주머니답게 행동해 알았어? 피 주머니 말이야 지성을 보여주잖아, 멀로크 잠재력이 넘치는 애 같아

translation.en: I think he reeks of potential.
translation.ko: 지성을 보여주잖아, 멀로크 잠재력이 넘치는 애 같아

translation.en: Ow! Sorry.
Souvenir.
We all have a destiny, Darren.
With a few simple tests, we can find out what yours is.
translation.ko: 몇 가지 간단한 검사로 네 운명을 알아낼 수 있지

translation.en: Wonderful to meet you, Darren.
Oh, it's like looking in a mirror.
Darren!
We'll be in touch. [ Fingers Snap ]
Freaky dream. Freaky, freaky.
Hey. Hey. [ Octa Squeaking ]
translation.ko: 이봐, 내가 가서 먹이를 구해 올게

translation.en: I'm gonna try to get you some food, okay? Just hold on one sec.
translation.ko: 이봐, 내가 가서 먹이를 구해 올게 잠시만 기다려 창가의 파리 좀 잡아다 줄게

translation.en: -I'm gonna go get some flies from the windowsill, okay? -Hey.
translation.ko: 잠시만 기다려 창가의 파리 좀 잡아다 줄게

translation.en: Why are you acting so weird?
[ Scoffs ] I'm-I'm not acting weird.
You were just talking to your backpack. Yeah. What? No, I wasn't.
translation.ko: - 책가방한테 얘기했잖아 - 뭐? - 아니라니까 - 분명 그랬어

translation.en: Darren, yes, you were. I wasn't.
Let-Let... Just let me see. See? It's just my backpack.
translation.ko: - 안 했어 - 어디 한번 봐 - 그냥 책가방이야 - 됐어

translation.en: Seriously, stop it. Just... Let me just see.
translation.ko: - 그냥 책가방이야 - 됐어 - 책가방 줘 - 한 번만 보자니까

translation.en: Holy shit! That's... That's the-the-- Yeah.
I went back to the theater after the show, and I kind of borrowed it.
translation.ko: 공연이 끝난 다음 무대 뒤로 가서 빌려온 셈이지

translation.en: You stole from a vampire? Do you realize you're a dead man?
translation.ko: 공연이 끝난 다음 무대 뒤로 가서 빌려온 셈이지 뱀파이어 물건을 훔쳐? 넌 죽은 목숨이야!

translation.en: Shh! He's never gonna find me. You're a dead man.
Okay? Just... [ Chuckles ]
translation.ko: - 끝장났다고! - 날 절대 못 찾아내 그래, 그냥...

translation.en: Wait a second. When...
translation.ko: 잠깐만 버 호스텐의 방에 갔을 때

translation.en: When did you go to Vur Horsten's room, and... what did you see?
translation.ko: 잠깐만 버 호스텐의 방에 갔을 때 뭘 봤어?

translation.en: All right, I saw everything. Steve, are you crazy?
translation.ko: 그래, 다 봤어 스티브, 너 미쳤어? 왜 뱀파이어가 되려고 해?

translation.en: Why would you want to become a vampire?
translation.ko: 스티브, 너 미쳤어? 왜 뱀파이어가 되려고 해?

translation.en: Listen, you can't understand.
translation.ko: 넌 이해 못 해 모든 걸 가졌으니까

translation.en: You have everything. What do I have?
translation.ko: 넌 이해 못 해 모든 걸 가졌으니까 나한텐 뭐가 있지? 비밀 친구?

translation.en: A secret best friend?
Hey. Leave it in there, okay? I gotta see it.
It's fine. I wanna see it.
Be careful, okay? Hey! Be careful, okay? Be really... careful.
This thing's even more hideous close up.
[ Squeaking ] Can you just put it back now, please?
translation.ko: 가까이서 보니까 더 끔찍하군 그만 제자리에 넣어

translation.en: [ School Bell Rings ] [ Gasps ] Look!
Okay. I need the pipe.
[ Girl ] I got a B-minus in history.
[ Darren ] No! [ Boy ] Check that out!
[ Screaming, Gasping ] Oh, my gosh! What is that?
Move! Steve, wait!
[ Steve ] Move! Get out of the way, idiot!
[ Steve ] Move! Watch out! Move!
-Hey! Steve, no! -[ Grunts ]
[ Students Screaming ] Now I got ya! Hold still! [ Grunts ]
What's the matter with you? Whose side are you on?
Hey. No! Hey.
Get it off me!
So what have you come to steal from me this time? [ Gasps ]
Thief! Nothing. Nothing.
translation.ko: 이번에는 뭘 훔쳐가려고? 이 도둑놈! 아무것도 안 훔쳐요

translation.en: Look, uh, Octa bit my best friend Steve,
translation.ko: 옥타가 스티브를 물어서 병원에 실려 갔어요

translation.en: and, uh, he's in the hospital in a coma because of me.
translation.ko: 옥타가 스티브를 물어서 병원에 실려 갔어요 저 때문에 혼수상태예요

translation.en: And, uh, I was wondering if you had an antidote.
I do.
translation.ko: 혹시 해독제가 있나 하고 왔어요 - 있어 - 고맙습니다

translation.en: Thank you. But I only have a couple doses left.
translation.ko: - 있어 - 고맙습니다 하지만 남은 게 얼마 없어

translation.en: Why should I waste any on some little psychopath?
translation.ko: 그걸 왜 미친 녀석한테 낭비해야 하지?

translation.en: Please, I'm begging you, okay?
translation.ko: 그걸 왜 미친 녀석한테 낭비해야 하지? 제발요 제발 도와주세요

translation.en: Look, I'm really sorry I stole Octa. I...
translation.ko: 옥타를 훔쳐서 정말 죄송해요 왜 그랬는지 저도 모르겠어요

translation.en: I don't know what came over me. I-I... I never steal things.
translation.ko: 옥타를 훔쳐서 정말 죄송해요 왜 그랬는지 저도 모르겠어요 - 원래 안 훔치는데 - 뭐 어때?

translation.en: Why not?
Because it's wrong.
So then you've learned a valuable moral lesson. Yes, I have.
And you'll never do anything wrong again as long as you live.
translation.ko: 살아있는 동안 다시는 나쁜 짓을 안 하겠구나

translation.en: No, I won't. You see?
translation.ko: 살아있는 동안 다시는 나쁜 짓을 안 하겠구나 안 할 거예요 봐라, 넌 도둑에 거짓말쟁이야

translation.en: Now you're a thief and a liar.
What did Mr. Tiny want?
Mr. Tiny? The fat man in the limousine.
translation.ko: - 타이니 씨요? - 리무진 탄 뚱보 말이야!

translation.en: I don't know. Something about, uh, souls and, uh... and destiny.
And he knew where I lived.
Looks like you're in deep shit, my larcenous friend.
translation.ko: 너 완전히 똥 밟았어 이 손버릇 나쁜 친구야

translation.en: Mr. Tiny doesn't just take a random interest in people.
translation.ko: 타이니 씨는 아무한테나 관심을 갖는 사람이 아니야

translation.en: And the people he does take an interest in wind up dead... or worse.
translation.ko: 그가 관심 갖는 사람은 죽거나 더 나쁜 일을 당해

translation.en: What's worse than dead?
Oh. Lots of things.
All right. I'll do it. I'll make you a bargain.
You'll become my assistant. I'll turn you into a half vampire.
translation.ko: 내 조수가 되거라 널 반쪽 뱀파이어로 만들어주마

translation.en: You'll be able to go out in the daylight. Very useful for me.
translation.ko: 대낮에 활동할 수 있으니 나한테는 쓸모가 많지

translation.en: You'll do chores for me and guard my coffin on the road.
translation.ko: 내가 시키는 일을 하고 여행하는 도중에 내 관을 지켜

translation.en: And in return, I'll try and keep Mr. Tiny away from you.
Oh, and I'll save your stupid friend Steve,
translation.ko: 그리고 멍청한 네 친구 스티브도 살려주마

translation.en: despite the fact that he threatened to kill me.
translation.ko: 그리고 멍청한 네 친구 스티브도 살려주마 날 죽이겠다고 위협했지만 말이야

translation.en: -You'll save Steve? -Why not?
translation.ko: - 스티브를 구해요? - 안 될 것 없지

translation.en: If I became a half vampire, would I have to kill people?
translation.ko: 반쪽 뱀파이어가 되면 사람들을 죽여야 하나요?

translation.en: Interested, huh?
Vampires don't kill the people they feed on.
translation.ko: 뱀파이어는 사람을 죽이지 않아 뱀파니즈들이 그런 짓을 하지

translation.en: Vampaneze do. Big source of controversy.
translation.ko: 뱀파이어는 사람을 죽이지 않아 뱀파니즈들이 그런 짓을 하지 논란이 끊이지 않아 80년 전쟁 끝에 휴전했지

translation.en: War for about 80 years, then a truce. Getting ugly again apparently.
translation.ko: 논란이 끊이지 않아 80년 전쟁 끝에 휴전했지 그런데 상황이 악화되고 있어 우린 시간만 죽이고 있고

translation.en: But time's wasting!
translation.ko: 그런데 상황이 악화되고 있어 우린 시간만 죽이고 있고

translation.en: Wanna become a vampire?
It's a lonely life, but there's lots of it.
translation.ko: 외로운 삶이야 하지만 훨씬 오래 살아

translation.en: I can't make that decision right now.
Do you wanna go home and ask your mommy and daddy?
Do they make all the decisions for good little boys like you?
translation.ko: 너처럼 착한 아이는 부모님이 대신 결정을 내려줘?

translation.en: No, they don't.
Poor Steve doesn't have much time left.
Fine. I'll do it.
To save my friend, not for any other reason. So get the antidote.
translation.ko: 오로지 친구를 구하기 위해서예요 - 해독제나 가져와요 - 여기 있어

translation.en: Right here.
Thank you. Thank you so much. First things first.
translation.ko: - 고마워요, 정말 고마워요 - 할 일은 해야지

translation.en: Let's test your blood.
What are you doing? I'm not gonna bite you in the jugular.
translation.ko: 왜 그래? 목은 안 물어 네가 죽을 수도 있으니까

translation.en: I could kill you that way. Show me your hands.
translation.ko: 왜 그래? 목은 안 물어 네가 죽을 수도 있으니까 손 내밀어

translation.en: You have good blood. This will work. All right. Hold up your hands.
translation.ko: 피가 좋군, 되겠어 자, 손을 이렇게 올려

translation.en: We're going to exchange blood. That's creepy.
I know. But that's how it's done.
This may hurt when it gets to your heart.
translation.ko: 심장에 다다르면 좀 아플 수도 있어

translation.en: I feel cold.
Lick your fingers.
Whoa. Is that like vampire power? Do I have super-spit now?
translation.ko: 뱀파이어의 능력이에요? 초능력 침이 생긴 거예요?

translation.en: Yes. You have super-spit. The rest will take a while.
translation.ko: 그래, 초능력 침이지 나머지는 시간이 좀 걸릴 거야

translation.en: The rest of what? What will I be able to do?
Can I, like, turn into a bat and stuff? No. That's bullshit.
translation.ko: - 박쥐로 변할 수 있어요? - 그건 순 엉터리야

translation.en: Now, hop on my back. We're going to flit.
translation.ko: 내 등에 업혀 번개 걸음을 해 보자

translation.en: We're gonna what? Just shut up and hop on my back.
translation.ko: - 뭘 해요? - 그냥 닥치고 업히기나 해

translation.en: You held your breath, right? Did I not tell you to hold your breath?
translation.ko: 숨 멈추고 있었지? 숨 멈추라고 말 안 했던가?

translation.en: Oh. Sorry.
Whoa. Hold on.
Why didn't we just take the elevator? I get claustrophobic.
translation.ko: - 엘리베이터 타면 되잖아요 - 폐소 공포증이 있어

translation.en: Strange, huh? Given where I sleep every night.
But somehow, when it's my own confined space, it's different.
translation.ko: 막힌 곳이라도 나만의 공간은 얘기가 다르지

translation.en: He looks horrible. Can you give him the antidote, please?
She really didn't like him.
Be careful.
Hey, what are you doing?
[ Vial Clatters ] Th-That's it, right? He's gonna be better now?
That's it.
You are insufferable. Code blue, room 519.
Back! Stay back!
Code blue. You have no idea how ridiculous you look right now.
translation.ko: 네 행동이 얼마나 우스운지 짐작조차 안 될걸

translation.en: -Code blue. -All right.
translation.ko: 청색경보... 이 상황이 현실이 아니라고 가장하고 싶다면 좋아

translation.en: If you want to pretend this isn't happening, fine.
translation.ko: 이 상황이 현실이 아니라고 가장하고 싶다면 좋아

translation.en: But being a vampire takes skill. What is a code blue?
translation.ko: 뱀파이어가 되는 것도 기술이 필요해 청색경보가 뭐야?

translation.en: Code blue. Code blue. Try not to do something stupid, like kill your family.
translation.ko: 청색경보 청색경보... 가족을 죽이는 짓 같은 멍청한 일은 하지 마

translation.en: Code blue. Code blue. Room 519. Stat.
You are not supposed to be in here!
All available staff, please report to room...
♪ Something is not right with me ♪ [ Laughing, Chattering ]
♪ Something is not right with me ♪ ♪ Something is not right with me ♪ It's great you're back.
♪ Trying not to let it show ♪ Well, well, well.
translation.ko: - 그래 - 보고 싶었어 이런, 이런, 이런 스티브가 돌아왔네?

translation.en: Steve is back, huh? So, Steve,
translation.ko: 이런, 이런, 이런 스티브가 돌아왔네? 그래, 스티브 나한테 줄 게 있지?

translation.en: whatcha... got for me?
translation.ko: 그래, 스티브 나한테 줄 게 있지?

translation.en: Stay away from those brownies. They're for dessert.
translation.ko: 브라우니에 손대지 마 후식으로 먹을 거야

translation.en: [ Darren ] Okay. No brownies.
Hey, Darren. Do you think that this outfit looks better on her, or this?
translation.ko: 대런 오빠, 얘한테 어떤 옷이 더 잘 어울려?

translation.en: What's going on?
You look weird. Darren.
Darren-- [ Screams ] [ Shouts ]
Sorry. Sorry, I...
translation.ko: 미안 미안 뱀파이어 흉내 좀 내봤어

translation.en: I was just pretending to be a vampire.
Nice room.
Some excellent reading material you have here.
Thought this was all on the Internet now.
Mine's blocked. Hmm.
Don't-Don't... Don't... Don't do that. Don't cry. [ Sobbing Softly ]
translation.ko: 안 돼, 그러지 마 울지 마

translation.en: Honestly. Stop, stop. No!
I'm not crying. Of course not. No, it's good.
Look, I don't want to hurt people, okay?

translation.en: I'm not like you. I was this close away from killing my sister.
translation.ko: 난 남을 해치기 싫어요 난 당신이 아니라고요 자칫 여동생을 죽일 뻔했어요

translation.en: Perhaps you should have thought of that before you stole my spider.
translation.ko: 그런 건 거미를 훔치기 전에 생각했어야지

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry, but you can't stay here. You're going to have to leave them.
translation.ko: 유감이지만 여기 있으면 안 돼 넌 가족을 떠나야 해

translation.en: Like forever? Like forever.
It's time to admit that to yourself, Darren.
But you can't just leave.
You're going to have to die first.
Hi, Mom. Hi, Dad. [ Mr. Shan ] Hmm.
Hi. Hi.
[ Chuckles ] Hey, uh, I just wanted to say that you guys are really, really good parents.
translation.ko: 그냥 두 분이 정말 좋은 부모님이란 걸 말씀드리려고요

translation.en: You're doing a great job. And, um, I'm sorry for not doing all my chores,
translation.ko: 고생 많이 하시는데 전 책임도 다 안 하고

translation.en: and for complaining so much.
And, uh, I love you guys a lot. We love you too, sweetie.
translation.ko: - 엄마, 아빠, 사랑해요 - 우리도 널 사랑해, 얘야

translation.en: Bye, Annie.
How old were you when you became a vampire?
Twenty. It was 1803, the third of May.
I'd just been left by my fiancée, Hesther Collins.
translation.ko: 약혼녀 헤스더 콜린스가 막 떠나간 뒤였지

translation.en: I thought she was the most beautiful girl in Baltimore.
translation.ko: 볼티모어에서 가장 아름다운 여자인 줄 알았지

translation.en: I saw her again 60 years later. She was an old crone.
But my heart still beat like a jackrabbit.
Wow. Dumped, huh?
So big bad old Crepsley became a vampire 'cause he got dumped?
[ Chuckles ] Have you ever been dumped?
Yeah. Then perhaps you should be more sympathetic.
translation.ko: 네 그럼 좀 더 동정심을 보여야 하지 않을까?

translation.en: Here it is. Drink up.
My lips are numb. Good.
I've got pins and needles in my hands. Excellent.
translation.ko: 손바닥이 바늘에 찔리듯 따끔거려요 훌륭해 약이 듣는단 뜻이야

translation.en: That means it's working.
Nice night actually.
Is that the Little Dipper or the big one? I can never remember.
Sorry about that.
translation.ko: 저거 작은곰자리야? 큰곰자리? 항상 헷갈려 미안해

translation.en: I had to do that, or they would never believe you were dead.
translation.ko: 그럴 수밖에 없었어 사람들이 안 믿을 테니까

translation.en: Don't worry. There's no damage to your spinal cord.
translation.ko: 그럴 수밖에 없었어 사람들이 안 믿을 테니까 척추는 걱정 마

translation.en: And I'll sneak into the funeral home and fix your broken neck.
Oh, and sorry about this next part.
Darren.
I hate you so much for leaving me here with these idiots.
translation.ko: 이 못된 자식 멍청이들만 남기고 먼저 가다니

translation.en: Darren. Hey, Shan!
Asswipe, are you in there? Steve.
translation.ko: - 이 자식, 죽은 척 마! - 스티브

translation.en: Darren! Okay, time out. Time out. Not about you. We're all feeling grief.
translation.ko: 이제 그만해, 너뿐만 아니라 모두들 슬프고 괴로워

translation.en: Wakey, wakey.
Here. Fill that hole.
I can't do that. I'm all cramped up. My legs are still numb.
translation.ko: 못해요, 갇혀 있다 보니 아직도 다리 감각이 없어요

translation.en: Can you feel this? Ow! What the heck!
Do you smell a rotting corpse? Ha-ha. Very funny.
translation.ko: - 이거 시체 썩는 냄새지? - 퍽이나 재미있네요

translation.en: Get back in the grave.
I'm not getting back in the grave. Don't argue with me.
translation.ko: - 무덤 속으로 들어가 - 무덤은 싫어요 - 말대꾸 말고 들어가 - 싫어요

translation.en: Get in. No.
Hello, old friend. Old Crepsley.
How's the scar? Shall I give you another?
translation.ko: 오랜만이군, 크렙슬리 흉터는 어때? 또 하나 만들어줄까?

translation.en: Hello, bag of blood.
You're coming with me.
Run!
You come with Murlaugh now. You're one of us.
Not one of those filthy vampires.
[ Muffled ] Let go of me!
Hold your breath! [ Screaming, Muffled ]
translation.ko: - 숨을 참아 - 네? 안 돼요, 안 돼

translation.en: Let's go! Not yet!
Don't look behind you.
Oh, my God! Oh, my God! Are you all right?
Come here! [ Flesh Tearing ]
[ Panting ] Breathe.
Whoa! Oh, my God.
translation.ko: 홈플레이트로 바로 던져! - 세상에 - 아는 사람들이야?

translation.en: Do you know those guys?
Are we there yet? Almost.
Where are we? The Cirque's winter campgrounds.
You'll be safe here if they let you stay.
translation.ko: 널 받아준다면 안전하게 지낼 수 있어

translation.en: Try to fit in.
Come on. So all the freaks live here?
Yes.
[ Clears Throat ] Don't stare.
[ Woman ] Oh, it's gonna be really a huge one, yeah.
Wanna go to my tent? We can rehearse in my tent.
translation.ko: 내 텐트로 갈래? 내 텐트에서 리허설하면 돼

translation.en: I'm not gonna rehearse in your tent.
It'll be great, you know. You always have fun rehearsing in the tent.
Wait here for me.
[ Man ] If you set everything up so I can just throw it out ...
translation.ko: 생각해봤는데 말이야 쭉 이러고 살 수는 없잖아? 일단 틀만 세워 속은 내가 채울게

translation.en: Neutral. The Cirque has always remained neutral.
That's how it has survived all these years. You'll still be neutral.
translation.ko: - 지금껏 살아남은 비결이야 - 계속 중립을 지키세요

translation.en: I'm not trying to drag you into anything.
translation.ko: - 지금껏 살아남은 비결이야 - 계속 중립을 지키세요 당신을 끌어들이려는 게 아니라 그냥 제가 빠져나오려는 겁니다

translation.en: I'm trying to keep myself out of it.
translation.ko: 당신을 끌어들이려는 게 아니라 그냥 제가 빠져나오려는 겁니다

translation.en: And why exactly do you think Tiny wants this boy? I'm not sure yet.
translation.ko: 타이니가 이 소년을 노리는 이유가 뭔가? 아직 잘 모르겠어요

translation.en: But whenever Mr. Tiny wants something,
I make it my policy to try and keep him from it.
translation.ko: 못 가지도록 막는 게 제 방침입니다

translation.en: That's a dangerous policy.
Hey, what are you doing? That's Mr. Tall's tent.
translation.ko: 뭐 하는 거야? 거긴 톨 씨의 텐트야

translation.en: I... Hi. I'm-I'm Darren.
What are you doing here?
translation.ko: 난 대런이라고 해 - 여기서 뭐 해? - 나도 그걸 알고 싶어

translation.en: [ Chuckles ] That's-That's what I'm trying to figure out.
translation.ko: - 여기서 뭐 해? - 나도 그걸 알고 싶어

translation.en: You can listen if you want.
How much does the boy know?
translation.ko: - 소년이 얼마나 알고 있지? - 전혀 몰라요

translation.en: Nothing. He's waiting by my tent if you want to speak with him.
translation.ko: - 소년이 얼마나 알고 있지? - 전혀 몰라요 제 텐트에서 기다리고 있으니까 원하시면 만나보시죠

translation.en: You know, Larten, the thing you might not realize about children is...

translation.en: they don't always do what they're told!

translation.en: Rebecca. Don't you have work you should be doing?

translation.en: Yes. Sorry, Mr. Tall. It won't happen again.
translation.ko: 죄송해요, 톨 씨 다시는 엿듣는 일 없을 거예요

translation.en: I mean, I don't eavesdrop on people. It was his idea.
translation.ko: 죄송해요, 톨 씨 다시는 엿듣는 일 없을 거예요 - 얘가 시켰어요 - 난 시킨 적 없어

translation.en: I didn't make you do anything. Well, you couldn't make me do anything if you tried.
translation.ko: - 얘가 시켰어요 - 난 시킨 적 없어 시킨다고 들을 나도 아냐

translation.en: Oh, really, huh? Enough. Rebecca.
I would like you to take Darren to Evra's tent.
Evra will be his roommate while he stays with us.
translation.ko: 대런을 에브라의 텐트로 데려다주렴 대런은 여기 머무는 동안 에브라하고 지낼 거야

translation.en: You'll have to work, Darren. Everybody here pitches in.
translation.ko: 일을 해야 해, 대런 여기선 다들 일을 맡아서 하지

translation.en: That's fine. I, uh...
I actually worked for my dad's office a couple weeks this summer.
translation.ko: 이번 여름에 아빠 사무실에서 몇 주 동안 일했어요

translation.en: I did photocopies, so...
This is on a temporary basis, Larten. I can't endanger everybody for your sake.
translation.ko: 잠시 동안만일세, 라텐 모든를 위험에 빠뜨릴 순 없어

translation.en: Of course. Thank you.
So, what are you doing here anyway with all these freaks?
translation.ko: 그런데 넌 여기서 괴물들하고 뭐 하는 거야?

translation.en: Why? Do you have a problem with freaks?
No, I mean, they, uh, kind of freak me out, but--
They freak you out. Clever. Really clever.
translation.ko: 그게 아니라 좀 무섭고 거북해서... 괴물 때문에 놀라셨어? 정말 똑똑하네

translation.en: Well, I really have to get back to work. Harkat can show you the way.
translation.ko: 난 그만 일하러 갈게 하캣이 길을 안내해줄 거야

translation.en: Harkat, take Darren to Evra's tent, please.
translation.ko: 하캣, 대런을 에브라의 텐트로 좀 데려다줘

translation.en: Well, you better follow him.
Okay, see you sometime.
Huh! No, I saw what you did to my friend Steve's hand at the theater, buddy.
translation.ko: 싫어, 극장에서 네가 스티브의 손을 물었잖아

translation.en: Dude, I'm not giving you my hand, okay?
translation.ko: 야, 난 너랑 손잡기 싫단 말이야

translation.en: I'm sorry. Here.
Harkat! You have to stop biting people,
translation.ko: 하캣! 사람들 그만 물어 안 그럼 다들 너랑 안 놀아

translation.en: or no one will want to be around you.
translation.ko: 사람들 그만 물어 안 그럼 다들 너랑 안 놀아

translation.en: You.
Death.
Redemption. Despair.
[ Jabbering ] Triumph. Disaster.
What did I say?
"Death, redemption, despair, triumph, disaster."
Well, don't worry about it. Go ahead, Harkat. Take him to Evra's.
translation.ko: 신경 쓰지 마 하캣, 에브라한테 데려가

translation.en: And no more teeth.
You mean, this is it?
Chill in the laundry for a sec. There you go.
translation.ko: 빨랫감 속에서 좀 쉬어 그렇지, 착하다

translation.en: Good girl. Good snake.
translation.ko: 빨랫감 속에서 좀 쉬어 그렇지, 착하다 착한 뱀이구나 사랑해

translation.en: Love you.
So, I guess we're gonna be roommates. So how are you f'ed up?
translation.ko: 방을 같이 쓰게 된 모양이군 넌 뭔 과야?

translation.en: F'ed up?
Freaked up. How-How... What kind of freak are you?
translation.ko: - 뭔 과? - 무슨 과 - 무슨 종류의 괴물이냐고 - 난 괴물 아냐, 정상이야

translation.en: Oh, I'm-I'm not a freak. I'm normal.
translation.ko: - 무슨 종류의 괴물이냐고 - 난 괴물 아냐, 정상이야

translation.en: You're normal?
No, I mean, I'm half vampire, but I'm completely normal.
You're half vampire, but you're normal.
I like that.
And-And don't worry about, like, if I'm gonna drink your blood or anything.
translation.ko: 염려 안 해도 돼 네 피는 안 빨아먹을게

translation.en: I'm ... I'm not gonna drink anyone's blood.
translation.ko: 어느 누구의 피도 안 마실 거야

translation.en: What a relief. Okay, this isn't awkward at all.
This is your corner of the tent. All right?
You do not cross over to any other part of the tent, except to enter and exit the tent.
translation.ko: 텐트 다른 곳에는 절대 가지 마 텐트 출입할 때만 빼고 알았지?

translation.en: All right? And you are never, ever to touch my stuff.
translation.ko: 텐트 출입할 때만 빼고 알았지? 내 물건에는 절대 손대지 마 특히 이것 말이야

translation.en: Especially this stuff over here. This is my recording studio.
translation.ko: 내 물건에는 절대 손대지 마 특히 이것 말이야 내 녹음 스튜디오야

translation.en: Oh, cool. Yeah, I... I actually used to have a drum set, but...
[ Sighs ] You know, my-my parents made me give it away, so-- Mmm. Yeah.
Well, there are no parents here. [ Chuckles ]
Yeah. Shedding. [ Chuckles ] Itches like crazy.
translation.ko: 허물 벗느라 그래 미칠 듯이 가렵지

translation.en: Uh, you should actually go wash your hand off before you get pinkeye.
translation.ko: 얼른 손 씻어 안 그럼 결막염 걸려

translation.en: Did you forget to tell me you were gonna go away for a couple of days?
translation.ko: 며칠 어디 다녀온다고 왜 말 안 했어?

translation.en: Huh? I can't believe you're treating me like this.
translation.ko: 며칠 어디 다녀온다고 왜 말 안 했어? 어떻게 이럴 수 있어? 걱정돼서 죽는 줄 알았어

translation.en: I've been worried sick. Why can't you just get a cell phone?
translation.ko: 어떻게 이럴 수 있어? 걱정돼서 죽는 줄 알았어 휴대폰 하나 장만해

translation.en: Because vampires don't need cell phones. Oh!
"Vampires don't need this. Vampires don't need that."
I'll tell you what vampires need. They need to listen.
translation.ko: 뱀파이어들한테 필요한 게 뭔지 알아? 남의 말을 듣는 거야 내가 예감이 안 좋다고 했지?

translation.en: Didn't I tell you that I had a foreboding? And what do you do?
translation.ko: 남의 말을 듣는 거야 내가 예감이 안 좋다고 했지? 그런데 무슨 짓을 했지? 아이를 달고 왔잖아

translation.en: You show up here with that kid. It's been a long night.
translation.ko: 그런데 무슨 짓을 했지? 아이를 달고 왔잖아 밤새 2개 주를 줄달음쳐 왔어 잠 좀 자야겠어

translation.en: I just flitted across two states. I think I'll just hit the pine early.
translation.ko: 밤새 2개 주를 줄달음쳐 왔어 잠 좀 자야겠어

translation.en: No, wait.
You don't love me anymore. It's my beard.
translation.ko: 더 이상 날 사랑하지 않는군 내 수염 때문이야

translation.en: You know how I feel about you. I just don't want to outlive anyone.
translation.ko: 내 마음 알잖아 사랑하는 사람을 보내긴 싫어

translation.en: It's depressing watching people you care about grow old while you stay young.
translation.ko: 사랑하는 사람이 나보다 먼저 늙는 걸 보면 우울해

translation.en: Have you looked at yourself in the mirror lately? [ Chuckles ]
You're no kid. Oh, no, no.
translation.ko: 당신도 늙었어 안 돼 나 아직 화 안 풀렸어

translation.en: I'm still angry at you. Mm-mmm. Mm-mmm. Mmm.
translation.ko: 안 돼 나 아직 화 안 풀렸어

translation.en: Your mouth says no, but your beard says yes. [ Light Thump ]
translation.ko: 입은 아니라고 하지만 수염은 그렇다고 하는군

translation.en: I can't believe he's gone, man. I know. He was like my best friend.
translation.ko: 대런이 죽다니 - 나랑 제일 친했는데 - 아냐, 나랑 제일 친했어

translation.en: No, he was my best friend. I knew him first.
translation.ko: - 나랑 제일 친했는데 - 아냐, 나랑 제일 친했어 - 내가 먼저 사귀었어 - 그래서?

translation.en: So what? I thought he was a dick.
translation.ko: - 내가 먼저 사귀었어 - 그래서? 난 그 자식 밥맛이던데

translation.en: What? What? [ Grunts ]
Dude. [ Chuckles ]
Get up before one of the teachers sees you. Get up.
translation.ko: - 야 - 이런... 선생님 오기 전에 일어나 저 자식은 꼴통이야

translation.en: That kid's psycho.
translation.ko: 선생님 오기 전에 일어나 저 자식은 꼴통이야

translation.en: Mr. Leonard, whatcha got for me here? Finish the quiz already?
translation.ko: 레너드 군, 줄 게 있지? 문제를 벌써 다 풀었나?

translation.en: - [ Mr. Tiny ] Careful. -[ Gasps ]
The first step is a big one.
Oh, I know. You miss... the one known as Darren.
You feel betrayed, abandoned. You're a loyal friend...
translation.ko: 배신당하고 버려진 기분일 거야 충직한 친구로군

translation.en: unlike him.
Darren was a loyal friend.
Oh, really? What if I told you he's still alive?
translation.ko: - 대런은 충직한 친구였어요 - 정말? 녀석은 아직 살아있어 네 자리를 가로챘고

translation.en: He's taken your place, stealing your dreams.
translation.ko: 녀석은 아직 살아있어 네 자리를 가로챘고 네 꿈을 훔쳤어 난 알아

translation.en: Oh, I know. You dream of killing people, drinking their blood.
translation.ko: 네 꿈을 훔쳤어 난 알아 다른 사람들을 죽이고 피를 마시는 꿈 말이야

translation.en: You dream of leading a great bloodthirsty army.
translation.ko: 넌 피에 굶주린 대군을 이끄는 꿈을 꾸잖아

translation.en: Who the hell are you?
translation.ko: 넌 피에 굶주린 대군을 이끄는 꿈을 꾸잖아 도대체 누구시죠?

translation.en: I'm Mr. Tiny.
Are you a vampire? I'm not a vampire.
translation.ko: - 난 타이니야 - 뱀파이어예요? 난 뱀파이어가 아니야 뱀파니즈도 아니지

translation.en: I'm not a Vampaneze.
I'm... an aficionado.
I want to see a marvelous war.
What do you want from me, you freak?
Oh, I'm not a freak. I despise freaks.
Can a freak travel back and forth between life and death?
I think not.
Can a freak create new life from rotting flesh and dead souls? Please!
translation.ko: 괴물이 썩은 육신과 죽은 영혼으로 새 생명을 창조할 수 있을까? 턱도 없지

translation.en: Can a freak bring about the apocalypse... and rule the world?
translation.ko: 괴물 따위가 종말을 일으키고 세상을 지배할 수 있을까?

translation.en: No.
Sadly, neither can I... not without help. I need a champion.
translation.ko: 유감스럽지만 나도 못해 챔피언의 도움을 받아야 하지

translation.en: One of two boys, two dear friends.
translation.ko: 절친한 두 친구 두 소년 가운데 하나 말이야

translation.en: And by the way, I love your D.N.A.
You care for a pancake?
No, I... I can't. I'm, uh-- We know what you are.
You're bad news, that's what.
Huh! But nothing I couldn't deal with in just about... two bites.
translation.ko: 하지만 뭐가 됐든 두어 번이면 다 씹어먹어

translation.en: Don't mind him. He just needs some ex-lax.
translation.ko: 신경 쓰지 마 변비약을 못 먹어서 저래

translation.en: Welcome to the Cirque. [ Evra ] Yeah.
translation.ko: 신경 쓰지 마 변비약을 못 먹어서 저래 - 서커스단에 잘 왔어 - 고마워요

translation.en: Thank you. There he is.
Would you like to eat one of my hands? I can grow them back.
translation.ko: 내 손 먹을래? 금방 다시 돋아나

translation.en: -They're very delicious. -Hey, Vampelina.
Come on. We gotta go clean out Wolfie's cage and then, uh,
translation.ko: 안녕, 뱀파이어 언니 늑대 우리 청소해야지

translation.en: Crepsley left like a list of stuff for you to do for him.
translation.ko: 크렙슬리가 네가 할 일의 목록을 만들어 뒀어

translation.en: It looks like you're Crepsley's bitch now.
Evra! What?
Okay, so you guys are gonna do it. And go.
I can't believe the Tiny People eat these rats.
They'll eat you if you don't watch out.
[ Jabbers, Chuckles ] [ Screams ] Don't!
-♪♪ [ Continues, Indistinct ] - So where do you come from anyways?
I guess I could probably, like, open this up,
and then you'd probably turn into dust or something, huh?
You wouldn't like that now, would you, Dracula?
Who's the boss now, baby?
Okay. Concentrate now. How hard can it be to flit?
translation.ko: 자, 집중하자 번개 걸음이 뭐가 어려워?

translation.en: [ Crash ] Ow! Perfect!
What's the point?
[ Crying ] I'm just not that much of a freak. Gertha, you're a major freak.
translation.ko: - 난 별로 괴물 아냐 - 거사, 넌 엄청 괴물이야

translation.en: Sorry. You're not my type. [ Sniffles ] ♪♪ [ Ends ]
Do you ever miss your family?
Not really. I joined the Cirque when I was two... two days old, that is.
translation.ko: 별로 내 나이 둘에 여기 왔어 생후 이틀 말이야

translation.en: Mr. Tall found me in a Dumpster.
So I guess this is my family.
[ Playing Guitar ] ♪ Dumpster baby Oh, Dumpster baby ♪
♪ I wanna be your Dumpster baby ♪
translation.ko: 쓰레기통 아기 오, 쓰레기통 아기 나는 당신의 쓰레기통 아기가 될래요

translation.en: Nah.
What are you doing? Oh, nothing.
May I see it?
Yeah, I guess. I've always wanted one of these.
translation.ko: - 네 - 늘 이런 걸 갖고 싶었어

translation.en: Hey! What are you doing?
We must be very careful who we talk to, Darren.
translation.ko: 이봐요! 무슨 짓이에요? 말 상대를 극도로 가려야 해, 대런

translation.en: Go to your tent and stay there with Evra.
[ Chuckles ] Yes. I have returned.
I have returned! [ Cheering ]
Unacceptable. Unforgivable. To blood a child? J'accuse!
translation.ko: 용납도 용서도 안 돼 어린애를 뱀파이어로 만들다니

translation.en: By the way, is he drinking enough blood?
He's not drinking any blood.
Not drinking blood? Crepsley, don't you know he has to? He must!
translation.ko: - 피는 안 마셔 - 안 마신다고? 크렙슬리, 자넨 알잖아? 반드시 마셔야 해

translation.en: Or perhaps you're worried he'll love it too much.
translation.ko: 피를 너무 좋아할까 봐 걱정되는가 보군

translation.en: He might be Vampaneze at heart.
You'd like that. You've been favoring them for the last hundred years.
translation.ko: - 본성은 뱀파니즈일지도 몰라 - 그러길 바라겠지 지난 백 년간 자넨 놈들 편을 들었으니까

translation.en: Oh, on the contrary. I'm strictly neutral... like the Cirque.
translation.ko: 천만에, 난 철저히 중립이야 서커스단처럼 말이야

translation.en: -Correct, Mr. Tall? -Correct.
Then tell us why you want him.
It's one of your self-fulfilling prophecies, isn't it?
Well, one does dream of the cataclysm.
This truce may not last forever.
translation.ko: 휴전 협정이 영원히 지속될 순 없어

translation.en: There might be new leaders ... new blood, as it were.
translation.ko: 새로운 지도자 새로운 피가 등장할 수도 있지

translation.en: Perhaps a boy... a bloodthirsty boy.
[ Object Taps Table ] It's all been written.
Then why do you care? You're up to something, Desmond.
translation.ko: 예언에 다 나와 있어 그런데 왜 신경 써? 분명 뭔가 있어, 데스몬드

translation.en: Me? I may write the script,
but the characters have a tendency to do as they please.
translation.ko: 등장인물들은 자기 마음대로 하려는 경향이 있어

translation.en: You, for example, have an unseemly amount of free will.
translation.ko: 예를 들어 자네는 자유 의지가 꼴같잖게 많아

translation.en: Now, Mr. Tall, will you be reasonable and give me the child?
translation.ko: 톨 씨, 이제 그만 꼬마를 나한테 넘기시죠

translation.en: I've always done what you ask. I'm not one to cause trouble.
translation.ko: 난 항상 자네 요구를 들어줬지 말썽을 일으키기 싫으니까

translation.en: But I need to think about all this. I won't make a decision hastily.
translation.ko: 그런데 생각 좀 해봐야겠어 서둘러 결정을 내리긴 싫어

translation.en: You know I always get what I want... in the end.
translation.ko: 난 원하는 건 항상 손에 넣어 결국엔 말이야

translation.en: [ Mr. Tiny ] Keep an eye on him, my pets.
Hey, dude. Sorry. We're on our own today.
translation.ko: 안녕, 안됐지만 오늘은 우리끼리 해야 해

translation.en: Rebecca's back in the costume shop. Oh.
Hey. Hey.
Uh, I'm-I'm here for, uh, Crepsley's cape.
It's that red one with the-- I know what Crepsley's cape looks like.
Oh. What do your friends want?
translation.ko: - 붉은색에다... - 어떻게 생겼는지 나도 알아 네 친구들은 왜 왔어?

translation.en: Hey! Beat it!
Does this trailer have, like, a back entrance or something?
Yeah, uh, it's right back there. Wait, your pants are ripped.
translation.ko: 응, 저기 뒤쪽이야 잠깐, 바지가 찢어졌어

translation.en: Take 'em off. Try... this pair on.
They fit. Yeah.
So, um... You know, Rebecca, you...
you never really told me what you're doing here with the Cirque.
translation.ko: 서커스단에서 네 역할이 뭔지 한 번도 얘기 안 했잖아

translation.en: Well, Darren, since you ask...
I'm a monkey girl.
You're a what?
What? Nothing. I...
translation.ko: - 뭐라고? - 뭐? 아냐, 그냥 네가 원숭이 소녀라고 한 것 같아서

translation.en: [ Laughs ] I thought you just said you were a monkey girl.
translation.ko: 아냐, 그냥 네가 원숭이 소녀라고 한 것 같아서

translation.en: What? Oh, yeah. [ Chuckles ]
Yeah.
What... What does that mean?
It means I have a tail.
translation.ko: 그게 무슨 뜻인데? 그러니까 꼬리가 달렸어 그래서 뭐 문제 있어?

translation.en: Do you have a problem with that?
translation.ko: 그러니까 꼬리가 달렸어 그래서 뭐 문제 있어?

translation.en: No, because-because... 'cause you're joking, right?
No, I'm not joking. I keep it wrapped up because people kept stepping on it.
translation.ko: 농담 아냐 밟히기 싫어서 꼬리 말고 다녀

translation.en: Oh. Yeah.
Anyway... Your pants look really good.
Yeah, I know. You... You-You... You picked it out. That's really good.
Thanks. They've been spying on me all day.
So if-if you were interested in a girl, okay,
translation.ko: 관심 가는 여자애가 있는데 걔가 만약...

translation.en: and she had, like... like, a tail, let's say,
translation.ko: 관심 가는 여자애가 있는데 걔가 만약... 꼬리가 달렸다면 무슨 문제가 있을지...

translation.en: would that be a problem or-- Well, I'll put it to you this way.
translation.ko: 꼬리가 달렸다면 무슨 문제가 있을지... 글쎄 이렇게 생각하자고

translation.en: If you had told me a couple hundred years ago...
that I would someday be dating a woman with bristles on her chin,
translation.ko: 내가 수염 달린 여자랑 데이트할 거라고 말했다면

translation.en: I would have told you you were insane. But here we are.
translation.ko: 너더러 미쳤다고 했겠지 하지만 지금 만나고 있잖아?

translation.en: By the way, there's a new rule. You're not to leave camp anymore.
translation.ko: 어쨌든 새 규칙이 생겼다 서커스단 밖으로 나가지 마

translation.en: Why not? Because I said so.
You can't just tell me what to do--
[ Crepsley ] When was the last time you were in a fight? Uh, second grade.
Steve's usually the one that gets in all the fights.
Well, Steve's not here to fight for you.
translation.ko: 널 위해 싸워줄 스티브는 여기 없어

translation.en: And what if I wasn't either?
What if you were alone in the dark and someone wanted to kill you?
translation.ko: 너 혼자 어둠 속에 있는데 누가 네 목숨을 노린다면?

translation.en: Rip out your heart and drink its blood?
translation.ko: 네 심장을 뜯어내 피를 마시려면 어떡할 거야?

translation.en: What then?
translation.ko: 네 심장을 뜯어내 피를 마시려면 어떡할 거야? 어떡할 거냐고

translation.en: Crepsley?
Crepsley, come on.
Crepsley?
[ Grunts ] You're hurting me. What are you going to do about it? Well?
You're soft. You're a soft little boy.
They're looking for you, Darren. This is not the school yard.
translation.ko: 놈들이 널 노려, 대런 학교 운동장 얘기가 아냐

translation.en: You either have to learn to fight or to run.
So which is it going to be?
[ Grunts ] Good. But don't use your fist. You have something better.
translation.ko: 좋아, 주먹은 쓰지 마 더 좋은 게 있으니까

translation.en: Use your fingernails like a dagger. Watch.
Try it. Extend your fingers and follow all the way through.
translation.ko: 해봐, 손가락을 쫙 펴서 끝까지 휘둘러

translation.en: Use all your strength.
Aah, God! I think I broke a nail. You broke a nail?
You need blood. We have a lot of work to do.
-Blood will have blood. -[ All ] Blood will have blood.
translation.ko: - 피가 피를 부른다 - 피가 피를 부른다

translation.en: Are you ready, you filthy little pig, to be stuck?
translation.ko: 더러운 돼지 놈아 손톱에 찔릴 준비가 됐나?

translation.en: Do you renounce living with the living?
Are you prepared to die... with the dead?
translation.ko: 죽은 자와 함께 죽을 준비가 됐나?

translation.en: Steve, what-what the hell are you doing?
[ Laughs ] Well, hi, Mr. Kersey. Uh, I just wanted to stop by real quick...
translation.ko: - 스티브, 웬일이야? - 안녕하세요, 커시 선생님? 그냥 잠시 들러서

translation.en: and actually apologize for the way, you know, I've been acting in school lately.
It's 3:00 a.m.
My teachers troubled me when I was a lad.
translation.ko: 내가 어릴 때 선생들이 날 괴롭혔지

translation.en: They caned me and caned me till I was bloody.
translation.ko: 피가 나도록 몽둥이로 날 두들겨 팼지

translation.en: Then one day, I took up a broken switch,
translation.ko: 그러던 어느 날 난 부러진 회초리를

translation.en: and I rammed it in my teacher's eyeball.
I'm his mentor.
You see, Steve?
This is what Crepsley wants us to live with.
So, Mr. Kersey. Whatcha got for me? [ Screams ]
translation.ko: 자, 커시 선생 나한테 줄 게 있지?

translation.en: So you really don't kill people? No, Darren.
translation.ko: - 사람은 정말 안 죽여요? - 안 죽여, 대런

translation.en: You just sedate them and feed a little bit, and then leave.
translation.ko: 마취시켜서 피를 좀 빤 다음 보내주는 거야

translation.en: I actually developed the method.
Well, two other vampires and I... Gavner and Vincent.
translation.ko: 사실은 두 명 더 있어 개브너하고 빈센트지

translation.en: We were the freaks of the vampire world. No one understood us.
translation.ko: 우린 뱀파이어계의 괴물이었지 아무도 안 알아주더군

translation.en: And then they started to realize...
that if you don't kill your prey every time like a little piggy,
translation.ko: 돼지 새끼 키우듯 먹잇감을 계속 살려두면

translation.en: then you don't get hunted down by irate townspeople with pitchforks and torches.
translation.ko: 쇠스랑과 횃불을 든 성난 군중에게 추격당할 일이 없다는 걸 말이야

translation.en: And now half the vampires feed this way, and the other half hate us.
translation.ko: 뱀파이어 절반은 우릴 따르고 나머지 절반은 우릴 증오하지

translation.en: Quiet now.
Whoa. How'd you do that?
Vampires can exhale a gas that knocks out humans.
translation.ko: 뱀파이어는 가스를 내뿜어서 사람들을 기절시킬 수 있어

translation.en: Really? Drink some blood, you'll be able to do all kinds of things.
translation.ko: 정말요? 피를 좀 마시면 모든 걸 다 할 수 있을 거야

translation.en: Now, we just make a small incision in his shoulder...
translation.ko: 피를 좀 마시면 모든 걸 다 할 수 있을 거야 이제 어깨를 조금만 절개해 바로 여기야

translation.en: right here.
translation.ko: 이제 어깨를 조금만 절개해 바로 여기야

translation.en: And then you take a sip.
Don't worry. He won't become a vampire unless you exchange blood with him.
translation.ko: 걱정 마, 뱀파이어로 안 변해 피만 교환하지 않으면 돼

translation.en: Go ahead. I had some a couple of days ago. It was very refreshing.
translation.ko: 어서, 난 며칠 전에 마셨어 정말 기운이 솟는다니까

translation.en: No, I'm-I'm not gonna drink human blood.
Hurry up before someone sees us. We haven't got all night.
translation.ko: 누가 보기 전에 서둘러 밤새 이러고 있을 순 없어

translation.en: I'm not going to.
You have to drink blood, Darren, or you'll die. It's as simple as that.
translation.ko: 피를 안 마시면 넌 죽어 바로 그거야

translation.en: Damned kid is gonna get himself killed.
Larten, what made you blood him?
I needed someone to run errands for me.
Aw, come on. You didn't need to blood him for that.
translation.ko: 고작 그것 때문에 피를 섞은 건 아니잖아

translation.en: I had a feeling if I didn't, something terrible would happen to him.
translation.ko: 고작 그것 때문에 피를 섞은 건 아니잖아 안 그러면 뭔가 끔찍한 일이 생길 것 같았어

translation.en: Something terrible? As opposed to becoming a vampire?
translation.ko: 끔찍한 일? 뱀파이어가 되는 것보다 더?

translation.en: I think you're getting lonely.
translation.ko: 당신 점점 외톨이가 되는 것 같아

translation.en: After 200 years of living alone, why on earth would I suddenly become lonely?
translation.ko: 2백 년이나 혼자 살았는데 갑자기 외톨이가 될 건 뭐야?

translation.en: I don't know. Midlife crisis? What is it?
They're here.
[ Rebecca ] Watch out!
-That's not fair. -Back!
[ Rebecca ] Darren, get out of here!
[ Crepsley ] Duck!
Move.
Get in.
I don't even like the Wolf Man,
but that don't mean you can come in here and beat up on a freak!
translation.ko: 그렇다고 해서 너희들 맘대로 괴물을 패도 좋단 건 아냐!

translation.en: You're messing with the wrong sideshow, baby! Yeah.
-I'll bite your damn noses off! -I'm gonna ram my head up your ass.
translation.ko: - 네 코를 물어뜯을 테야! - 내 머리를 엉덩이에 박는다

translation.en: Stop!
translation.ko: - 네 코를 물어뜯을 테야! - 내 머리를 엉덩이에 박는다 그만!

translation.en: Stop!
There'll be no fighting here.
How dare you enter this campground? The Vampire Council will hear of this.
translation.ko: 감히 이곳에 침입하다니 뱀파이어 평의회에 고발하겠다

translation.en: Tell the little vampire it's time to come home.
translation.ko: 애송이 뱀파이어에게 집에 갈 시간이라고 전해

translation.en: It's almost dawn. I have a spare coffin here. I suggest you get some rest as well.
translation.ko: 날이 거의 밝았어 남는 관이 있으니 거기서 쉬어

translation.en: -Aren't we gonna double back and attack them or something? -Do you want to stay alive?
translation.ko: 되돌아가서 놈들을 공격해야 하잖아요? 죽고 싶어?

translation.en: You're not even drinking blood yet. I doubt you'd be much good in a fight.
translation.ko: 넌 아직 피 맛도 안 봤잖아 싸움에 별 도움이 안 될 거야

translation.en: Well, what if they hurt someone? People can look out for themselves.
translation.ko: - 놈들이 단원들을 해치면요? - 각자 제 앞가림은 해

translation.en: You've been looking out for me.
Why? Why? Because I'm an idiot, that's why.
Only an idiot would spit in the eye of Mr. Tiny.
translation.ko: 바보니까 타이니 씨에게 감히 맞서는 거야

translation.en: Because he doesn't just kill people. He brings them back as well.
translation.ko: 사람을 죽일 뿐만 아니라 되살리기도 하는 막강한 존재야

translation.en: And when I finally die, I plan on staying dead.
translation.ko: 난 언젠가 죽게 되면 다시 살아나고 싶지 않아

translation.en: Life may be meaningless, but death I still have hope for.
translation.ko: 삶은 무의미하지만 죽음은 내게 희망을 주거든

translation.en: Life isn't meaningless.
Tell me that after 200 years of it, kid. Good day.
translation.ko: 2백 년 살고 얘기해 좋은 하루 보내

translation.en: [ Woman ] You know, I never liked him. [ Woman #2 ] I never did either.
[ Woman #1 ] I told you when I first saw him. [ Woman #3 ] Should never have let him in.
translation.ko: - 처음 봤을 때 그랬잖아 - 받아주는 게 아니었어

translation.en: [ Woman #4 ] It's his fault. [ Man ] They came because of him.
translation.ko: 다 쟤 탓이야 그런데도 뻔뻔스럽게 돌아다니는 것 좀 봐

translation.en: [ Woman #5 ] I can't believe he has the nerve to walk around here.
translation.ko: 그런데도 뻔뻔스럽게 돌아다니는 것 좀 봐

translation.en: [ Woman #6 ] That poor Rebecca.
They took her? Where?
I don't know. But they said to tell you... to come home.
translation.ko: 몰라, 그런데 놈들이 너한테 집에 오라던데

translation.en: Which, of course, you're not gonna do.
translation.ko: 당연히 넌 안 가겠지 야, 대런, 안 돼

translation.en: Wait, Darren, Darren. No, buddy. Those guys are huge, man.
translation.ko: 당연히 넌 안 가겠지 야, 대런, 안 돼 놈들은 엄청 커

translation.en: Hey, Mr. and Mrs. Shan. Hey, Annie. Steve. What are you doin' here?
translation.ko: - 아저씨, 아줌마, 애니 - 스티브, 여긴 웬일이니?

translation.en: Well, you know, I've been thinking. You guys probably really miss your son.
translation.ko: 글쎄요, 아무래도 아드님이 무척 그리우실 것 같아서요

translation.en: And my mom is drunk half the time, so she doesn't really notice I'm there.
translation.ko: 저희 엄마는 고주망태라서 제가 오는지 가는지 몰라요

translation.en: How about you guys adopt me?
[ Flatware Clatters On Floor ] No interest?
Told you they wouldn't go for it.
Hmm. How disappointing.
So few "people" have the parenting instinct the way I do.
Ready for the prom.
♪ Make new friends but keep the old ♪
translation.ko: 새 친구를 사귀되 옛 친구도 간직해

translation.en: ♪ One is silver and the other's gold ♪
♪ Make new friends but keep the old ♪
translation.ko: 새 친구를 사귀되 옛 친구도 간직해

translation.en: ♪ One is silver and the other's gold ♪
Hey, Octa. Say good-bye to Crepsley for me, okay?
Tell him I'm sorry, but I have to go home.
It's time, isn't it?
Twenty-six. Uh-uh. Twenty-seven. Twenty-seven.
Twenty-seven. Hold on. Twenty-eight.
translation.ko: - 스물여섯, 27 - 스물일곱, 27 - 좋아, 아냐, 스물여덟 - 몇 개만 빌려줘

translation.en: May I borrow a couple of these? Yes.
translation.ko: - 좋아, 아냐, 스물여덟 - 몇 개만 빌려줘

translation.en: Don't forget to bring 'em back though... both of 'em.
You're in danger. Terrible danger. Your life and soul are in jeopardy.
translation.ko: 당신은 엄청난 위험에 빠졌어 목숨과 영혼이 위태로워

translation.en: What did I say? Nothing. Something about the weather.
translation.ko: - 내가 뭐라 그랬지? - 그냥 날씨 얘기였어

translation.en: Chance of thunderstorms tomorrow. Don't worry. I'll stay indoors.
translation.ko: 내일 폭우에다 천둥이 칠 거래 걱정 마, 실내에 있을게

translation.en: Applause! Applause!
Look. Little vampire. [ Snarls ]
Take a bow.
Where are my family and my friends? Please.
Must have patience. Will spoil the show.
Do you like? Does Murlaugh have talent?
No? What do you know about talent?
Where is Crepsley?
[ Shouts ] Where is Crepsley?
Too bad for "Crapsley."
Because he will miss the show!
Here is freak... all wrapped up tight.
-[ Muffled Grunt ] -And here are beloved family members. -[ Mr. Shan ] Oh! - Applause. Applause.
translation.ko: 그리고 사랑스런 식구들도 있고 박수, 박수 부탁해요

translation.en: Hello, beloved son. Hello, loving parents.
translation.ko: 안녕, 사랑스런 아들 안녕, 자상한 부모님

translation.en: Hello, cute little sister. -Four bags of blood. - [ Mrs. Shan Whimpers ]
translation.ko: 안녕, 귀여운 여동생 피 주머니가 네 개로군

translation.en: Don't worry. You're all gonna be okay. Will be better than okay.
translation.ko: - 걱정 마세요, 괜찮을 테니 - 괜찮은 정도가 아니지

translation.en: Will be... delicious!
But now may I present...
reunion with oldest friend and blood brother,
translation.ko: 가장 오랜 친구이자 피를 나눈 형제이며

translation.en: with he that shall one day rule us all...
the one known as Steve!
Thank you! Thank you!
Steve. You're alive?
[ Chuckles ] Wha-- You know, that was really an asshole thing for you to do.
translation.ko: 어떻게 그런 못된 짓을 할 수 있어?

translation.en: Make your whole family and your secret best friend go through all that?
translation.ko: 온 가족과 비밀 친구에게 그런 고통을 주다니

translation.en: Look, I didn't mean to hurt anybody, okay?
translation.ko: 누굴 괴롭게 할 마음은 전혀 없었어

translation.en: Who cares what you meant to do?
What you did was take my place. That was my dream.
translation.ko: 넌 내 자리를 가로챘어 그건 내 꿈이었다고

translation.en: Steve, what are you doing with him? Who? Murlaugh?
translation.ko: - 스티브, 저놈이랑 뭐 해? - 누구? 멀로크?

translation.en: Come on, man. He's not as bad as he looks.
You know, for one thing, he didn't say I had bad blood like Crepsley.
translation.ko: 그래도 크렙슬리처럼 내 피가 나쁘다고는 안 했어

translation.en: And for another thing, he didn't lie to me.
And you know what? They think I'm awesome.
They say I have a destiny, or whatever.
translation.ko: 나한테 운명이 있다나 뭐라나 네 꼴을 봐

translation.en: Look at you. Who wants to be a vampire anyways?
translation.ko: 나한테 운명이 있다나 뭐라나 네 꼴을 봐 누가 뱀파이어가 된다고 그래? 뱀파이어는 밥맛이야

translation.en: Vampires suck. Vampaneze rule!
translation.ko: 누가 뱀파이어가 된다고 그래? 뱀파이어는 밥맛이야 뱀파니즈가 최고야!

translation.en: -Juicy! -[ Muffled Scream ]
First guy I killed... Mr. Kersey.
Blood just gets me going. You know what I mean?
translation.ko: 나한테는 피가 딱이야 무슨 말인지 알아?

translation.en: I wouldn't know. I haven't been drinking any.
I know you. Always trying to look like Mr. Goody Two-shoes all the time.
translation.ko: 난 널 알아 늘 범생이처럼 보이려고 애쓰지

translation.en: I bet you'll, like, resist drinking blood, and resist drinking and resist drinking it.
translation.ko: 장담하건대 피 안 마시려고 버티고 버티고 버티다가

translation.en: At the last second become this total bloodhound!
[ Chuckles ] All right, man. Here's the deal.
See, the fat guy, he still wants you on the team.
translation.ko: 뚱보 아저씨가 여전히 널 원해 그리고 어찌 됐든

translation.en: And despite everything else, you are still my best friend.
translation.ko: 뚱보 아저씨가 여전히 널 원해 그리고 어찌 됐든 넌 여전히 내 친구잖아 그러니까 내가 시키는 대로 해

translation.en: So I'll tell you what. I'll make you a deal that might just save your ass.
translation.ko: 넌 여전히 내 친구잖아 그러니까 내가 시키는 대로 해 그대로만 하면 목숨을 구할 수 있을 거야

translation.en: -If you kill your family, I'll let the freak go. -[ Grunts ]
translation.ko: 네 가족을 죽이면 저 괴물을 놔줄게

translation.en: Wait. My bad. That's backwards. If you kill the freak, I'll let your family live.
translation.ko: 이런, 반대로 말했네 괴물을 죽이면 가족을 살려줄게

translation.en: What? Let the juicy one go?
Hey. Look, man, it's part of the plan. - Talk to Mr. Tiny. -[ Scoffs ]
translation.ko: 그게 계획의 일부예요 타이니 씨하고 얘기해봐요

translation.en: So what do you say? Just kill her.
translation.ko: 어떡할 거야? 괴물 소녀를 죽여 참, 피도 마셔야 해

translation.en: Oh, yeah, you gotta drink her blood too.
translation.ko: 괴물 소녀를 죽여 참, 피도 마셔야 해

translation.en: You can do her with this.
[ Mr. Tiny ] Wait!
Allow him in, gentlemen.
I want to see this play out.
[ Steve ] Mmm, man, that was pathetic. You're totally weak. You need some blood.
translation.ko: 딱하기도 해라 넌 약해서 피를 마셔야 해

translation.en: -Murlaugh. -Finally.
-And we thought you weren't gonna show. -[ Octa Squeaking ]
-I hate spiders! -[ Squeaking ]
Darren. Come here.
Okay.
Is that your tail? Well, yeah.
I'm really sorry I got you involved in this, okay? I-- Please stop staring.
translation.ko: 이런 일에 끌어들여서 정말 미안해 그만 쳐다봐 피가 필요한 거지?

translation.en: So you really need blood? Yeah.
translation.ko: 그만 쳐다봐 피가 필요한 거지? - 응 - 좋아

translation.en: All right. Can you just take a little?
Go ahead. I'm offering it to you.
translation.ko: 조금만 빨아 어서 너니까 주는 거야

translation.en: Thanks, but I... I just can't lose it. What?
Whatever's still making me human.
Darren, being human is not about what you are. It's about who you are.
translation.ko: 대런, 인간이든 뱀파이어든 중요한 건 사람 됨됨이야

translation.en: He's all yours, lad.
Good. Right in the heart.
Oh, so fair and foul a day I have not seen.
translation.ko: 일찍이 보지 못한 좋고도 궂은 날이야

translation.en: My people aren't weak like yours.
They will avenge me, Crepsley.
translation.ko: 내 원수를 갚아 줄 거야, 크렙슬리

translation.en: The truce... 100 years... is over.
The war begins. [ Chuckles ]
Marvelous. Magnificent!
Really. Bravo.
-Bravo. -It's just like you said.
translation.ko: 정말이야 대단해, 브라보 당신이 말한 대로 우리가 전쟁을 일으켰어요

translation.en: We started the war.
translation.ko: 당신이 말한 대로 우리가 전쟁을 일으켰어요

translation.en: It won't start a war... if nobody hears about it.
translation.ko: 소식만 전해지지 않으면 전쟁은 안 일어나

translation.en: Young people today are so difficult to control.
I hate you. I hate you!
I became a vampire to save you, Steve. Thanks!
translation.ko: 난 널 구하려고 뱀파이어가 됐어 고마워

translation.en: Go ahead. Just do it!
That's enough, boys.
Steve, come with me. Not before I kick his a--
translation.ko: 스티브 나와 같이 가자 - 이 자식을 먼저... - 내 말 들어!

translation.en: You will behave!
translation.ko: - 이 자식을 먼저... - 내 말 들어!

translation.en: It's not time for you to fight... not yet.
translation.ko: 네가 싸울 때가 아냐 아직 아니야

translation.en: Wh-What does that mean? Oh, it's all written down in a book.
translation.ko: - 무슨 뜻이죠? - 책에 다 쓰여 있어

translation.en: You do read books, don't you?
[ Darren ] Steve.
Look, don't... don't go.
What else am I supposed to do, man? Live with you and a bunch of freaks?
translation.ko: 그럼 어떡하라고? 너랑 괴물 떼거리랑 살아?

translation.en: It's too late now.
I have my destiny, and you have yours.
translation.ko: 나는 나대로 너는 너대로 운명이 있어

translation.en: How poignant. The parting of two dear friends.
translation.ko: 정말 가슴 아프군 두 벗의 이별이라니

translation.en: Such sweet sorrow.
Then again, you will come home to us one day,
translation.ko: 다시 말하지만 언젠간 너도 집에 올 거다

translation.en: my prodigal son.
After all,
translation.ko: 탕자야 어쨌든 네가 바로 피에 굶주린 뱀파이어야

translation.en: you are the bloodthirsty one.
translation.ko: 어쨌든 네가 바로 피에 굶주린 뱀파이어야

translation.en: No. Just because I'm a vampire doesn't mean I'm bloodthirsty.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 난 뱀파이어지만 피에 굶주리진 않았어요

translation.en: It's not about what you are. It's about who you are.
translation.ko: 인간이든 뱀파이어든 중요한 건 사람 됨됨이죠

translation.en: Oh. I almost forgot.
Cover yourself.
You have to teach me how to do that someday.
Oh, I'll teach you everything, son.
All my gibes and gambols. Now, ready to go meet your people?
translation.ko: 속속들이 전수해주지 네 종족들을 만나러 갈까?

translation.en: Bye, Annie.
[ Darren ] Will it work? Hypnotizing them?
[ Snoring ] [ Crepsley ] It works on the memories, but not on the emotions, not really.
translation.ko: 기억은 문제없지만 감정엔 효과가 거의 없어

translation.en: They'll always feel that you're still alive somehow.
translation.ko: 네가 살아있다는 걸 어떻게든 늘 느낄 거야

translation.en: Well, that's good, right? Is it?
Hey, can I ask you something?
Can I kiss you?
Darren, I let you drink my blood. Sure, you can kiss me.
translation.ko: 대런, 내 피도 줬잖아 당연히 키스해도 돼

translation.en: Come on. We don't have all night. I have an injured spider here.
translation.ko: 서둘러, 날 새겠다 부상당한 거미 치료해야 해

translation.en: All right, how are we going to do this? I can't carry the both of you.
translation.ko: 근데 어떡하지? 너희 둘 다는 못 업어

translation.en: You carry Rebecca. I can flit now.
translation.ko: 얠 업어요 전 번개 걸음으로 갈게요

translation.en: Just like a real vampire.
Oh, Larten, you did it.
You stuck your neck out for him.
You'd think a vampire would know better than to stick his neck out.
I am proud of you.
[ Mr. Tall ] All those who vote for making Darren a member of the Cirque,
raise your hands.
-One hand, Evra. -Damn it.
It's done. He will stay.
So we get to stay.
Not for long, I'm afraid.
You know, Crepsley, it's okay.
It's weird. I've spent so much time wishing that... none of this would have happened,
translation.ko: 이상해요, 이런 일이 없기를 얼마나 빌었는지 몰라요

translation.en: and that we never would have been to the Cirque in the first place.
But now I really can't imagine my life happening any other way.
translation.ko: 하지만 이젠 지금과 다른 삶은 상상조차 안 돼요

translation.en: Dawn's coming.
I had something made for you. It's in your tent.
translation.ko: 널 위해 만든 게 있어 네 텐트에다 뒀어

translation.en: A little gift.
And it's Mr. Crepsley.
[ Squeaking ] Because you told me to throw you. Well, I'm sorry.
You did it, man. Once a general, always a general.
translation.ko: 해냈군, 친구 한번 장군은 영원한 장군이지

translation.en: I couldn't have done it better myself.
At nightfall, we leave with the boy.
translation.ko: 나라도 더 잘하진 못했을 거야 밤이 오면 아이를 데려가겠네

translation.en: I suppose we should tell him.
No, let's give him one day to rest. He's earned it.
translation.ko: 아냐, 하루만 쉬게 해줘 고생 많이 했으니까

translation.en: [ Darren Narrating ] Sometimes life does seem all planned out ... like there's no choice in the matter.
translation.ko: 때론 인생길이 이미 예정됐고 선택의 여지가 없어 보인다

translation.en: But that's an illusion. Speakers. Tasty.
[ Sighs ] My name's Darren Shan.
And I don't just live with a bunch of freaks. I'm one too.
translation.ko: 그냥 괴물들과 사는 게 아니라 나 역시 괴물이다
